carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: Canteens and cafeterias are one of the important parts of student life where you can find most of students chatting and gossiping on different topics. It plays a vital role in removing tensions and refreshing students. The college canteen is fairly new and provides enough and delicious food at affordable rates. EMEA College of Arts & Science has the facility of spacious, clean and hygienic canteens and cafeterias that caters to the taste of all students. Canteens can conveniently accommodate 100 students at a time. The College has a one canteen and one cafeteria inside the campus in which variety of dishes are available at most nominal rates. The canteens and cafeterias remain open on all working days. It provides all types of nutritious and hygienic eatables and beverages to cater to the students, staff and visitors.

The canteen is situated within the college campus. It is open for all and there is a separate seating arrangement for staff and students. All types of snacks, soft drinks, meals are available at subsidized rates.The canteen is opens at 8 am up to 5 pm every day.The canteen has a food counters providing with a variety of food items to choose from! A well-organized “coupon” system is followed in the canteen in which a coupon is bought from the main counter and this coupon is used to get the desired food item.

div.class: carousel-item pt152 pb152 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level active
carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: In today’s world, security is an increasing priority for educational institutions. There are real and potential treats for students, teachers, non-teaching staff and material assets and CCTV has become increasingly popular in the academic institutions. The college has installed CCTV Surveillance System by installing 25 cameras in different strategic locations.

div.div:
Co-Operative store
There is a co-operative store in the campus run by the EMEA College Co-operative Society. It provides various stationary items, notebooks, practical record books, assignment books, textbooks and various application forms to the students of the college at lower prices. It produces and supplies note books and assignment books bearing the name of the college. The store is open on all working days, throughout the working time of the college.
>

div.class: carousel-item pt152 pb152 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level active
carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: The cafeteria is a hub of student activity, social-exchange and youthful energy. Bustling with social life, it is also a place where students exchange crucial ideas, pool in effort and strategise on every day activities. It serves as a place for diverse interests, from brainstorming for competitions to relishing a hot cup of coffee.

div.p: Staff attendance is monitored through biometric attendance system. Biometric attendance recorded from various biometric devices for teaching and non teaching staff are loaded to server system.

div.class: carousel-item pt152 pb152 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level active
carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: The EMEA Campus provides 150 Mbps high speed internet LAN and a 24×7 Wi-Fi facility in the college campus for the student and faculty members to avail seamless internet connectivity any time, at any place, in the college and hostel. The college Firewall blocks restricted and unwanted sites. The connectivity through a fully networked campus with state-of-the-art IT infrastructure, computing & communication resources, offers the students, facilities of e-mail, net surfing, up/down loading of web content, software and applications which are very necessary and handy, while preparing for the day-to-day study, projects & seminars.

div.class: carousel-item pt152 pb152 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level active
carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: We have two buses available for the welfare of the students. Students should avail this bus facility with ID card by duly paying the bus fees. Students need to pay the bus fees for the two semesters at the beginning itself. When they travel, they should daily sit on the seats and advised to avoid the footboard journey.Currently the route schedules takes care of the requirements of the students who avail these facilities.

carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: The open-air theatre is located in the heart of campus which is utilised for cultural performances, evening talks and various other stage events.It can accommodate an audience of 200 at a time.

div.class: carousel-item pt152 pb152 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level active
carousel-item pt96 pb96 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level
carousel-item pt128 pb128 oe_img_bg o_bg_img_center o_colored_level

div.p: The EMEA College Classroom Announcement System represents a pivotal component in the institution's educational infrastructure, designed to streamline communication between faculty and students. This modern, digital platform enables instructors to disseminate important information swiftly and efficiently, ensuring that all students are kept abreast of course updates, deadlines, changes in the schedule, and urgent notifications.Functioning across various digital devices and platforms, the system allows for real-time updates, facilitating a seamless flow of information that is crucial for maintaining the academic calendar's integrity and assisting students in managing their study schedules effectively. It also supports interactive features, such as Q&A sessions, polls, and feedback collection, enhancing student engagement and participation in the educational process.By leveraging this technology, EMEA College aims to foster a more connected, informed, and responsive academic environment, where communication barriers are minimized, and educational experiences are enriched for both teachers and learners.
